channel.title: earthsea on HD-DN
channel.description: Recent content in earthsea on HD-DN

item.title: A Wizard of Earthsea
item.description: A young man discovers his knack for magic when he saves the people of his village from an invading force. He is sent to a school of magic, but in his arrogance and haste to prove himself summons a dark shadow of his own power which sets itself against him.

item.title: The Farthest Shore
item.description: A young prince, heir to a long-empty throne, comes to the island of mages with word that magic is failing. He and the archmage set out across the sea to investigate, finding at the edges of the world the fatal consequences of mages' misled desires to cheat death.

item.title: The Tombs Of Atuan
item.description: A young girl is taken from her home and stripped of her name and identity to serve the Nameless Gods of the Kargish empire.
